1.title: Home
1.content: The files /assets/jekyll-*/* are copies of Gemfile and the resulting search-data.json generated by /assets/js/zzzz-search-data.json. (The only difference between the latter and https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pmarsceill/just-the-docs/master/assets/js/zzzz-search-data.json is the replacement of '' by "", to circumvent an issue on macOS.) . Jekyll-3.8.7 and 4.1.1 produce the expected content with rendered search data. Jekyll-4.2.0 (run locally) produces content with unrendered search data.
